themes: Declining City Council support for the arts
Threats to preservation of bed tax funds
Potential collapse of the cultural ecosystem
key_phrases: tapped to participate in visioning the future
plan that gets placed in a drawer and never used
Don't waste our time if you can't deliver
City Council is less supportive of the arts now than I've seen in my 44 years working in the arts in Austin
preservation of bed tax funds to support the arts
If it goes away, we will see the cultural ecosystem take a nosedive
barriers_identified: Lack of follow-through on planning processes
Decreasing political support from City Council
Threat to dedicated arts funding (bed tax funds)
solutions_proposed: Preserve bed tax funds to support the arts
